channel.title: Adding Crowns
channel.description:
Ok, i am using the Client source and cache of TrisidiaX. I am sorta mad that all the staff (mods,admins,Owner) have all of the same crows. I already have the new one i want and so i am wondering if someone would be generous enough to help me out.
If you want to download the Client Cache and source to see if u can do it and tell me about it: http://uppit.com/jr34hylxd9d6/TrisidiaX_Source_Client_Cache_V2.zip
(NOT MY LINK! THIS IS TRISIDIAX'S LINK)

item.title: Adding Crowns
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Host Gushers:

Thats the problem bro. For some reason the crowns arent in the sprites folder but ingame they are there.

You should use a Cache editor program such as Tom’s Cache Suite.

Read full topic
